attributes.action: Form a coalition government for the next two years to negotiate the Brexit deal.
attributes.additional_details:
We cannot afford to be further divided with leadership struggles and a general election.  All political parties should now come together and form the best team to represent the needs of all britains.

There are references galore, with just a few below..

The Times June 25 2016 Supplement - How Britain Voted.
David Cameron resigns.
Labour infighting over Jeremy Corbyn's leadership.
Scotland call for 2nd referendum on leaving the union.
Sinn Fein cal for a united Ireland in Europe
attributes.background: With the country split over the vote to leave the EU, the votes having come from across normal party political divides and the main parties in turmoil, it is critical that we all feel truly represented in the deal struck for our future, and that we present a united kingdom at the negotiation table.
